trans-unit.source: The string-based connection syntax provides a workaround for this rule: If the slot has default parameters, those parameters can be omitted from the signal. When the signal is emitted with fewer arguments than the slot, Qt runs the slot using default parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 基于字符串的连接语法为这一规则提供了一个变通方法:如果槽有默认参数,这些参数可以从信号中省略。当信号发出时,其参数比槽的参数少,Qt就会使用默认参数值运行槽。

trans-unit.source: The string-based syntax can connect C++ objects to QML objects, but the functor-based syntax cannot. This is because QML types are resolved at run-time, so they are not available to the C++ compiler.
trans-unit.target: 基于字符串的语法可以将C++对象与QML对象连接起来,但基于漏子的语法却不能。这是因为QML类型是在运行时解析的,所以C++编译器无法使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The stringified error message in case an error occurred.

The structured plastic material has the following properties:

The structured representation of a text document presents its contents as a hierarchy of text blocks, frames, tables, and other objects. These provide a logical structure to the document and describe how their contents will be displayed. Generally, frames and tables are used to group other structures while text blocks contain the actual textual information.
trans-unit.target: 文本文档的结构化表示将其内容以文本块、框架、表格和其他对象的层次结构呈现。这些对象为文档提供了一个逻辑结构,并描述了如何显示其内容。一般来说,框架和表格用于组合其他结构,而文本块则包含实际的文本信息。

trans-unit.source: The structures for radio and check buttons are identical. We show the structure using QCheckBox element and pixel metric names:
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮和复选按钮的结构相同。我们使用QCheckBox元素和像素指标名称显示结构：

trans-unit.source: The style Component for the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的样式组件。

trans-unit.source: The style Component for this control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件的样式组件。

trans-unit.source: The style also contains a set of style hints, which is represented as values in the StyleHint enum. All widgets do not have the same functionality and look in the different styles. For instance, when the menu items in a menu do not fit in a single column on the screen, some styles support scrolling while others draw more than one column to fit all items.
trans-unit.target: 样式还包含一组样式提示，这些提示在StyleHint枚举中表示为值。所有小部件均不具有相同的功能，并且外观不同。例如，当菜单中的菜单项不适合屏幕上的一列时，某些样式支持滚动，而另一些样式则绘制多于一列的样式以适合所有项目。

trans-unit.source: The style calculates the spacing between widgets in layouts. There are two ways the style can handle these calculations. You can set the PM_LayoutHorizontalSpacing and PM_LayoutVerticalSpacing, which is the way the Java style does it (through QCommonStyle). Alternatively, you can implement QStyle::layoutSpacing() and QStyle::layoutSpacingImplementation() if you need more control over this part of the layout. In these functions you can calculate the spacing based on control types (QSizePolicy::ControlType) for different size policies (QSizePolicy::Policy) and also the style option for the widget in question.
trans-unit.target: 样式计算布局中小部件之间的间距。样式可以通过两种方式处理这些计算。您可以设置 PM_LayoutHorizontalSpacing 和 PM_LayoutVerticalSpacing ，这是Java样式（通过QCommonStyle）的方式。另外，如果您需要对布局的这一部分进行更多控制，则可以实现QStyle :: layoutSpacing（）和QStyle :: layoutSpacingImplementation（）。在这些函数中，您可以基于控件类型（QSizePolicy :: ControlType）为不同的大小策略（QSizePolicy :: Policy）以及相关小部件的样式选项计算间距。

trans-unit.source: The style can also be specified as a path to a custom style, such as ":/mystyle". See Creating a Custom Style for more details about building custom styles. Custom styles do not need to implement all controls. By default, the styling system uses the Default style as a fallback for controls that a custom style does not provide. It is possible to specify a different fallback style to customize or extend one of the built-in styles.

The style can also be specified as a path to a custom style, such as ":/mystyle". See Creating a Custom Style for more details about building custom styles. Custom styles do not need to implement all controls. By default, the styling system uses the Default style as a fallback for controls that a custom style does not provide. It is possible to specify a different fallback style to customize or extend one of the built-in styles.
trans-unit.target: 样式也可以指定为自定义样式的路径，例如 ":/mystyle" 。有关创建自定义样式的更多详细信息，请参见创建自定义样式。自定义样式不需要实现所有控件。默认情况下，样式系统使用默认样式作为自定义样式未提供的控件的后备。可以指定其他后备样式以自定义或扩展内置样式之一。

trans-unit.source: The style component for the menubar's own menus and their submenus.
trans-unit.target: menubar自己的菜单和子菜单的样式组件。

trans-unit.source: The style does not handle reverse layouts. We assume that the layout direction is left to right. QCommonStyle handles reverse widgets; if we implemented reverse layouts, widgets that we change the position of sub elements, or handle text alignment in labels ourselves would need to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 样式不处理反向布局。我们假设布局方向是从左到右。QCommonStyle处理反向小部件；如果我们实现反向布局，则我们需要更新更改子元素位置或处理标签中文本对齐的小部件。

trans-unit.source: The style elements and widgets, as mentioned, use the style to calculate bounding rectangles of sub elements and sub controls. Pixel metrics, which are style-dependent sizes in screen pixels, are also used for measurements when drawing. The available rectangles and pixel metrics are represented by three enums in QStyle: SubElement, SubControl, and PixelMetric. Values of the enums can easily by identified as they start with SE_, SC_ and PM_.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，样式元素和小部件使用样式来计算子元素和子控件的边界矩形。像素度量是屏幕像素中与样式相关的大小，在绘制时也用于测量。可用的矩形和像素度量由QStyle中的三个枚举表示：SubElement，SubControl和PixelMetric。枚举的值可以很容易地确定，因为它们以SE_，SC_和PM_开头。

trans-unit.source: The style gets all the information it needs to render the graphical element from the QStyleOption class. The widget is passed as the last argument in case the style needs it to perform special effects (such as animated default buttons on macOS), but it isn't mandatory. In fact, QStyle can be used to draw on any paint device (not just widgets), in which case the widget argument is a zero pointer.
trans-unit.target: 样式从QStyleOption类获取呈现图形元素所需的所有信息。如果样式需要其执行特殊效果（例如macOS上的动画默认按钮），则将其作为最后一个参数传递，但这不是强制性的。实际上，QStyle可用于在任何绘画设备（不仅仅是小部件）上绘制，在这种情况下，小部件参数是零指针。

trans-unit.source: The style gets all the information it needs to render the graphical element from the QStyleOption class. The widget is passed as the last argument in case the style needs it to perform special effects (such as animated default buttons on macOS), but it isn't mandatory. In fact, QStyle can be used to draw on any paint device (not just widgets), in which case the widget argument is a zero pointer.
The style hint affects the font matching algorithm. See QFont::StyleHint for the list of available hints.
trans-unit.target: 样式提示会影响字体匹配算法。有关可用提示的列表，请参见QFont :: StyleHint。

trans-unit.source: The style hints encapsulate a set of platform dependent properties such as double click intervals, full width selection and others.
trans-unit.target: 样式提示封装了一组平台依赖性属性,如双击间隔、全宽选择等。

trans-unit.source: The style is automatically selected and deployed on Android. See Getting Started with Qt for Android and Deploying an Application on Android for more details on the Android essentials.
trans-unit.target: 样式会自动选择并部署在Android上。见入门使用Qt针对Android和部署在Android应用程序用于在Android要领的更多细节。

trans-unit.source: The style is automatically selected and deployed on Android. See Getting Started with Qt for Android and Deploying an Application on Android for more details on the Android essentials.

The style is implemented in one class. We have done this because we find it convenient to keep all code in one file. Also, it is an advantage with regards to optimization as we instantiate less objects. We also keep the number of functions at a minimum by using switches to identify which element to draw in the functions. This results in large functions, but since we divide the code for each element in the switches, the code should still be easy to read.
trans-unit.target: 风格是在一个类中实现的。我们这样做是因为我们发现将所有代码保存在一个文件中很方便。同时,这也是优化的一个优势,因为我们实例化的对象更少。我们还通过使用开关来确定在函数中绘制哪个元素,从而使函数的数量保持在最低限度。这将导致函数的数量很大,但由于我们在开关中为每个元素划分了代码,所以代码应该还是容易阅读的。

trans-unit.source: The style used to decorate each item is set with setStyle() and can be read with the style() function. The style controls the type of bullet points and numbering scheme used for items in the list. Note that lists that use the decimal numbering scheme begin counting at 1 rather than 0.
trans-unit.target: 用于装饰每个项目的样式由setStyle（）设置，并且可以通过style（）函数读取。样式控制用于列表中项目的项目符号点的类型和编号方案。请注意，使用十进制编号方案的列表从1而不是0开始计数。

trans-unit.source: The stylesheet editor can be accessed by right-clicking a widget and selecting Change styleSheet...
trans-unit.target: 可以通过右键单击小部件并选择Change styleSheet来访问样式表编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The sub-classes of QStyleOption contain all information necessary to style the individual elements. Style options are instantiated - usually on the stack - and filled out by the caller of the QStyle function. Depending on what is drawn the style will expect different a different style option class. For example, the QStyle::PE_FrameFocusRect element expects a QStyleOptionFocusRect argument, and it's possible to create custom subclasses that a custom style can use. The style options keep public variables for performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: QStyleOption的子类包含样式各个元素所需的所有信息。样式选项被实例化-通常在堆栈上-并由QStyle函数的调用者填写。根据绘制的样式，样式将期望不同的样式选项类。例如， QStyle::PE_FrameFocusRect 元素需要一个QStyleOptionFocusRect参数，并且可以创建自定义样式可以使用的自定义子类。出于性能原因，样式选项保留公共变量。

trans-unit.source: The supported set of attributes provided by the HERE plugin are not fixed and may grow over time. Also the attributes provided may vary according to a place by place basis, e.g one place may provide opening hours while another does not. At the time of writing, it is known that some places provide openingHours (QPlaceAttribute::OpeningHours) and payment (QPlaceAttribute::Payment) methods but other attributes may be made available by the backend server. All places provided by the plugin will have the x_provider (QPlaceAttribute::Provider) attribute set to here.
trans-unit.target: HERE插件提供的受支持的属性集不是固定的，并且会随着时间的推移而增长。同样，所提供的属性可能会根据地点的不同而有所不同，例如，一个地方可能提供营业时间，而另一个地方没有提供营业时间。在写这篇文章的时候，已经知道一些地方提供 openingHours （QPlaceAttribute :: OpeningHours）和 payment （QPlaceAttribute ::付款）方式，但可以通过后端服务器提供的其它属性。插件提供的所有位置都将 x_provider （QPlaceAttribute :: Provider）属性设置为 here 。

trans-unit.source: The tab focus chain traverses elements by first visiting the parent, and then its children in the order they occur in the children property. Pressing the tab key on an item in the tab focus chain will move keyboard focus to the next item in the chain. Pressing BackTab (normally Shift+Tab) will move focus to the previous item.
trans-unit.target: 标签焦点链通过首先访问父元素,然后按照它们在children属性中出现的顺序访问其子元素来遍历元素。在标签焦点链中的一个项目上按tab键会将键盘焦点移动到链中的下一个项目。按BackTab(通常是Shift+Tab)键会将焦点移动到前一个项目。

trans-unit.source: The tab order is defined by clicking on each of the numbers in the correct order. The first number you click will change to red, indicating the currently edited position in the tab order chain. The widget associated with the number will become the first one in the tab order chain. Clicking on another widget will make it the second in the tab order, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 标签顺序是通过按正确的顺序点击每个数字来定义的。您点击的第一个数字将变为红色,表示当前编辑的标签顺序链中的位置。与该数字相关联的小组件将成为标签顺序链中的第一个小组件。单击另一个小组件将使其成为标签顺序中的第二个,以此类推。

The table cell format of a table cell in a document specifies the visual properties of the table cell.
trans-unit.target: 文档中的表单元格格式规定了表单元格的视觉属性。

trans-unit.source: The table currently being edited by the cursor is found with QTextCursor::currentTable(). This allows its format or dimensions to be changed after it has been inserted into a document.
trans-unit.target: 使用QTextCursor :: currentTable（）找到当前由光标编辑的表。这样可以在将其插入文档后更改其格式或尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The table format also provides a way to constrain the widths of the columns in the table. Columns can be assigned a fixed width, a variable width, or a percentage of the available width (see QTextLength). The columns() function returns the number of columns with constraints, and the columnWidthConstraints() function returns the constraints defined for the table. These quantities can also be set by calling setColumnWidthConstraints() with a list containing new constraints. If no constraints are required, clearColumnWidthConstraints() can be used to remove them.

The table format also provides a way to constrain the widths of the columns in the table. Columns can be assigned a fixed width, a variable width, or a percentage of the available width (see QTextLength). The columns() function returns the number of columns with constraints, and the columnWidthConstraints() function returns the constraints defined for the table. These quantities can also be set by calling setColumnWidthConstraints() with a vector containing new constraints. If no constraints are required, clearColumnWidthConstraints() can be used to remove them.
trans-unit.target: 表格式还提供了一种约束表中列宽度的方法。可以为列分配固定宽度，可变宽度或可用宽度的百分比（请参见QTextLength）。的列（）函数返回与约束的列的数量，以及columnWidthConstraints（）函数返回为表中定义的约束。也可以通过使用包含新约束的向量调用setColumnWidthConstraints（）来设置这些数量。如果不需要任何约束，则可以使用clearColumnWidthConstraints（）删除它们。

trans-unit.source: The table format is either defined when the table is created or changed later with setFormat().
trans-unit.target: 表格式可以在创建表时定义，也可以稍后使用setFormat（）进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The table has a vertical header that can be obtained using the verticalHeader() function, and a horizontal header that is available through the horizontalHeader() function. The height of each row in the table can be found by using rowHeight(); similarly, the width of columns can be found using columnWidth(). Since both of these are plain widgets, you can hide either of them using their hide() functions.
trans-unit.target: 该表具有可以使用verticalHeader（）函数获得的垂直标题，以及可以通过horizo​​ntalHeader（）函数获得的水平标题。可以通过使用rowHeight（）找到表中每一行的高度；同样，可以使用columnWidth（）找到列的宽度。由于这两个都是简单的小部件，因此您可以使用它们的hide（）函数隐藏它们中的任何一个。

trans-unit.source: The table must have a primary key declared.
trans-unit.target: 该表必须声明一个主键。

trans-unit.source: The table takes ownership of the item.
trans-unit.target: 该表对该项目拥有所有权。

trans-unit.source: The table takes ownership of the prototype.
trans-unit.target: 该表对原型的所有权。

trans-unit.source: The table view's default selection model is retrieved for later use. We do not modify any items in the model, but instead select a few items that the view will display at the top-left of the table. To do this, we need to retrieve the model indexes corresponding to the top-left and bottom-right items in the region to be selected:
trans-unit.target: 表视图的默认选择模型被检索出来,供以后使用。我们不修改模型中的任何项,而是选择视图将显示在表格左上角的几个项。要做到这一点,我们需要检索要选择的区域中左上角和右下角项目所对应的模型索引。

trans-unit.source: The table widget will use the item prototype clone function when it needs to create a new table item. For example when the user is editing in an empty cell. This is useful when you have a QTableWidgetItem subclass and want to make sure that QTableWidget creates instances of your subclass.
trans-unit.target: 当需要创建新表项时，表小部件将使用项原型克隆功能。例如，当用户在空单元格中编辑时。当您有QTableWidgetItem子类并且要确保QTableWidget创建子类的实例时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: The table's background color can be read with the background() function, and can be specified with setBackground(). The background color of each cell can be set independently, and will control the color of the cell within the padded area.
trans-unit.target: 表格的背景颜色可以使用background（）函数读取，也可以使用setBackground（）指定。可以独立设置每个单元格的背景颜色，并控制填充区域内单元格的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The table's primary key may not contain a relation to another table.
trans-unit.target: 该表的主键不得包含与另一表的关系。

trans-unit.source: The table-like interface to item data provided by models is ideal when using data in a table or list view; the row and column number system maps exactly to the way the views display items. However, structures such as tree views require the model to expose a more flexible interface to the items within. As a result, each item can also be the parent of another table of items, in much the same way that a top-level item in a tree view can contain another list of items.
trans-unit.target: 当使用表格或列表视图中的数据时,模型提供的类似表格的项目数据接口是非常理想的;行号和列号系统与视图显示项目的方式完全对应。然而,树状视图等结构要求模型对其中的项暴露出更灵活的接口。因此,每个项也可以是另一个项表的父项,就像树形视图中的顶层项可以包含另一个项列表一样。

The temperature is returned in degree Celsius. This property, if supported, provides the pressure sensor die temperature. Use QSensor::isFeatureSupported() with the QSensor::PressureSensorTemperature flag to determine its availability.

trans-unit.source: The test data has two elements, a QString called aString and an integer called expected. To fetch these values in the actual test:
trans-unit.target: 测试数据有两个元素，一个的QString称为 aString 和被叫的整数 expected 。要在实际测试中获取这些值：

trans-unit.source: The test framework will iterate over all of the rows in the table and pass each row to the test function. As shown, the columns can be extracted for use in the test. The tag column is special - it is printed by the test framework when a row fails, to help the reader identify which case failed amongst a set of otherwise passing tests.
trans-unit.target: 测试框架将遍历表中的所有行，并将每一行传递给测试函数。如图所示，可以提取这些列以用于测试。该 tag 栏是特殊的-它是由测试框架打印时连续失败，以帮助读者识别哪些情况下未能集合之中，否则测试通过。

trans-unit.source: The test harness scans the specified source directory recursively for "tst_*.qml" files. If QUICK_TEST_SOURCE_DIR is not defined, then the current directory will be scanned when the harness is run. Other *.qml files may appear for auxillary QML components that are used by the test.
trans-unit.target: 测试工具递归扫描指定的源目录中的“ tst _ *。qml”文件。如果 QUICK_TEST_SOURCE_DIR ，则在运行线束时将扫描当前目录。对于测试使用的辅助QML组件，可能会出现其他* .qml文件。

trans-unit.source: The test results are automatically cached, which also makes them available to all subprojects. It is therefore recommended to run all configuration tests in the top-level project file.
trans-unit.target: 测试结果会被自动缓存,这也使得所有子项目都可以使用。因此,建议在顶层项目文件中运行所有配置测试。

trans-unit.source: The test's own data is a single number per row. In this case, initTestCase_data() also supplies a locale per row. Therefore, this test will be run with every combination of locale from the latter and number from the former. Thus, with four rows in the global table and three in the local, the test function is run for 12 distinct test-cases (4 * 3 = 12).
The testdata file will be resolved as the first existing file from:

trans-unit.source: The text can be either rich text or plain text. If you specify a rich text formatted string, it will be rendered using the default stylesheet, making it possible to embed images in the displayed text. To be as fast as possible, the default stylesheet uses a simple method to determine whether the text can be rendered as plain text. See Qt::mightBeRichText() for details.

trans-unit.source: The text can be set or replaced using setHtml() which deletes any existing text and replaces it with the text passed in the setHtml() call. If you call setHtml() with legacy HTML, and then call toHtml(), the text that is returned may have different markup, but will render the same. The entire text can be deleted with clear().

trans-unit.source: The text layout creates a new line object that starts after the last line in the layout, or at the beginning if the layout is empty. trans-unit.target: 文本布局创建一个新的行对象，该对象从布局的最后一行之后开始，或者如果布局为空，则从开头开始。布局保留一个内部光标，并且在调用QTextLine :: setLineWidth（）函数时，从光标位置开始的每一行都填充有文本。

The text of the tooltip. It contains an empty string when the tooltip should be hidden.

The text on the //~ line is optional extra information. The first word of the text is used as an additional identifier in the XML element in the .ts file so make sure the first word is not part of the sentence. For example, the comment "Context Not related to that" is converted to "<extra-Context>Not related to that" in the .ts file.
trans-unit.target: //~ 行上的文本是可选的附加信息。文本的第一个单词用作.ts文件中XML元素中的附加标识符，因此请确保第一个单词不是句子的一部分。例如，.ts文件中的注释“与该上下文不相关”被转换为“ <与该上下文不相关的上下文”。

trans-unit.source: The text representation of JSON encloses arrays in square brackets ([ ... ]) and objects in curly brackets ({ ... }). Entries in arrays and objects are separated by commas. The separator between keys and values in an object is a colon (:).

trans-unit.source: The text that we add last is inserted after the child frame in the document. Since each frame is padded with text blocks, this ensures that more elements can always be inserted with a cursor.
trans-unit.target: 我们最后添加的文本会插入到文档中的子框架之后。由于每个框架都是用文本块填充的,这就保证了用光标可以随时插入更多的元素。

trans-unit.source: The text width specifies the preferred width for text in the document. If the text (or content in general) is wider than the specified with it is broken into multiple lines and grows vertically. If the text cannot be broken into multiple lines to fit into the specified text width it will be larger and the size() and the idealWidth() property will reflect that.
trans-unit.target: 文本宽度指定文档中文本的首选宽度。如果文本（或通常的内容）比指定的宽，它将分成多行并垂直增长。如果文本不能分成多行以适合指定的文本宽度，它将变大，并且size（）和IdealWidth（）属性将反映出来。

trans-unit.source: The text will be drawn using the font and the transformation set on the painter. trans-unit.target: 将使用字体和在画家上设置的变换来绘制文本。如果在画家上设置的字体和/或变换与用于初始化QStaticText的布局的字体和/或变换不同，则必须重新计算布局。使用QStaticText :: prepare（）进行初始化

trans-unit.source: The text-property is mostly suitable for setting the initial content and handling modifications to relatively small text content. The append(), insert() and remove() methods provide more fine-grained control and remarkably better performance for modifying especially large rich text content.
trans-unit.target: 文本属性最适合设置初始内容并处理对较小文本内容的修改。该追加（） ，插入（）和删除（）方法提供更精细的控制和修改特别是大富文本内容显着更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: The texture is a wrapper around an OpenGL texture, which texture id is given by textureId() and which size in pixels is given by textureSize(). hasAlphaChannel() reports if the texture contains opacity values and hasMipmaps() reports if the texture contains mipmap levels.
trans-unit.target: 该纹理是OpenGL纹理的包装，该纹理id由textureId（）给出，而其像素大小由textureSize（）给出。hasAlphaChannel（）报告纹理是否包含不透明度值，hasMipmaps（）报告纹理是否包含mipmap级别。

trans-unit.source: The texture object is opaque.
trans-unit.target: 纹理对象是不透明的。

trans-unit.source: The texture object owns the texture id and will delete the GL texture when the texture object is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 纹理对象拥有纹理id,当纹理对象被删除时,将删除GL纹理。

trans-unit.source: The texture object owns the texture id and will delete the OpenGL texture when the texture object is deleted.

trans-unit.source: The texture path uses a 2D Qt Quick scene to create dynamic texture content. Consider the following Texture definition:

The texture to be rendered can be set using setTexture(). How the texture should be rendered can be specified using setMipmapFiltering(), setFiltering(), setHorizontalWrapMode() and setVerticalWrapMode(). The rendering state is set on the texture instance just before it is bound.

trans-unit.source: The texture will return false for QSGTexture::hasAlphaChannel() and will not be blended. This flag was added in Qt 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 对于QSGTexture :: hasAlphaChannel（），纹理将返回false，并且不会被混合。这个标志是在Qt 5.6中添加的。

trans-unit.source: The textured material respects the current matrix and the alpha channel of the texture. It will also respect the accumulated opacity in the scenegraph.

trans-unit.source: The third class generated in the header is <Type>SourceAPI. This is a templated class, for use specifically by the templated version of QRemoteObjectHostBase::enableRemoting(), which allows you to use any QObject that supports the required API as the source. Use this class to hide or convert properties or signal/slot parameters. If your implementation does not provide the correct API, there will be compile-time warnings.

The third is that QPlaceManager::matchingPlaces() of the destination manager accept the QPlaceMatchRequest::AlternativeId as a parameter key and the alternative identifier attribute key as the value, in this case x_id_<provider name> would be the expected value. This indicates that the identifiers of places in the QPlaceMatchRequest should be matched against the x_id_<provider name> alternative identifier attributes.
trans-unit.target: 第三是目标管理器的QPlaceManager :: matchingPlaces（）接受QPlaceMatchRequest :: AlternativeId作为参数键，并使用替代标识符属性键作为值，在这种情况下， x_id_<provider 名称>将是预期值。这表明QPlaceMatchRequest中位置的标识符应与 x_id_<provider 名称>备用标识符属性进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: The third method is more convenient when you are simply testing your application on a device physically connected to your development machine (or an emulator). It will copy the Qt libraries into a temporary directory on your device and run the application against these instead. An APK built in this way is not distributable, since it relies on the device being prepared to contain the Qt libraries in the correct location. However, since the Qt libraries are only copied into the device once, it benefits from a faster turn-around time, so it's more suited for testing changes to your application during development. This deployment method can be selected by opening the Run settings of your project, expanding Deploy Configurations and choosing Deploy local Qt libraries. Make sure the Use local Qt libraries check box is also ticked.
trans-unit.target: 当您仅在物理上连接到开发机器（或仿真器）的设备上测试应用程序时，第三种方法更方便。它将Qt库复制到设备上的临时目录中，然后针对这些库运行应用程序。不能分发以这种方式构建的APK，因为它依赖于准备在正确位置包含Qt库的设备。但是，由于Qt库仅复制到设备一次，因此它受益于更快的周转时间，因此它更适合在开发过程中测试对应用程序的更改。可以通过打开项目的“运行”设置，展开“ 部署配置”并选择“ 部署本地Qt库”来选择此部署方法。。确保也选中了使用本地Qt库复选框。

trans-unit.source: The thread support commands are for specifying the level of support for multithreaded programming in a class or function. There are three levels of support: threadsafe, reentrant and nonreentrant.
trans-unit.target: 线程支持命令用于指定类或函数中对多线程编程的支持级别。支持分为三个级别： threadsafe ， reentrant 和 nonreentrant 重入。

trans-unit.source: The threaded renderer is currently used by default on Windows with Direct3D 11 and with OpenGL when using opengl32.dll, Linux excluding Mesa llvmpipe, macOS with Metal, mobile platforms, and Embedded Linux with EGLFS, and with Vulkan regardless of the platform. All this may change in future releases. It is always possible to force use of the threaded renderer by setting QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded in the environment.

The threaded renderer is currently used by default on Windows with opengl32.dll, Linux excluding Mesa llvmpipe, macOS with Metal, mobile platforms, and Embedded Linux with EGLFS, and with Vulkan regardless of the platform, but this is subject to change. It is always possible to force use of the threaded renderer by setting QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded in the environment.

The threaded renderer is currently used by default on Windows with opengl32.dll, Linux with non-Mesa based drivers, mobile platforms, and Embedded Linux with EGLFS but this is subject to change. It is possible to force use of the threaded renderer by setting QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当前，默认情况下，线程渲染器在Windows上使用opengl32.dll，在Linux上使用基于非Mesa的驱动程序，移动平台以及在Linux上使用EGLFS，但这可能会有所更改。通过在环境中设置 QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded 可以强制使用线程渲染器。

trans-unit.source: The three dimensional position of an object such as a mobile device can be specified by giving the latitude, longitude and altitude. That is the values held in the l {coordinate} type. Additionally for computation of future positions we would like to know if the object is moving, what speed it is doing and what is the timestamp of the last position data. Position therefore includes values for the coordinate, speed and a timestamp. Position also takes responsibility for validation of sensible values for these properties. These are exposed as the latitudeValid, longitudeValid, altitudeValid, speedValid, horizontalAccuracyValid, and verticalAccuracyValid properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过给出纬度，经度和海拔高度来指定诸如移动设备之类的物体的三维位置。这就是l {coordinate}类型中保存的值。另外，为了计算将来的位置，我们想知道对象是否在移动，它在做什么速度以及最后一个位置数据的时间戳是什么。因此，位置包括坐标，速度和时间戳记的值。职位还负责验证这些属性的合理值。这些暴露为latitudeValid，longitudeValid，海拔高度Valid，speedValid，horizo​​ntalAccuracyValid和verticalAccuracyValid属性。

trans-unit.source: The three original states have been renamed s11, s12 and s13 to reflect that they are now children of the new top-level state, s1. Child states implicitly inherit the transitions of their parent state. This means it is now sufficient to add a single transition from s1 to the final state s2. New states added to s1 will also automatically inherit this transition.
trans-unit.target: 这三个原始状态已重命名为 s11 ， s12 和 s13 ,以反映它们现在是新顶级状态 s1 的子级。子状态隐式继承其父状态的转换。这意味着现在添加从 s1 到最终状态 s2 的单个过渡就足够了。添加到 s1 的新状态也将自动继承此过渡。

New states added to s1 will automatically inherit this transition.

trans-unit.source: The time the CPU should wait, a non-zero value, for the GPU to finish its work after each call to Present(). The default value is 0 (disabled). This behavior effectively kills all parallelism but makes the behavior resemble the traditional swap-blocks-for-vsync model, which can be useful in some special cases. However, this behavior is not the same as setting the frame count to 1 because that still avoids blocking after Present(), and may only block when starting to prepare the next frame (or may not block at all depending on the time gap between the frames).
trans-unit.target: CPU在每次调用Present()后等待GPU完成工作的时间,非零值。默认值为0(禁用)。这个行为有效地扼杀了所有的并行性,但使行为类似于传统的swap-blocks-for-vsync模型,这在一些特殊情况下是有用的。然而,这种行为与将帧数设置为1是不同的,因为这仍然避免了在Present()之后的阻塞,并且可能只有在开始准备下一帧时才会阻塞(或者根据帧之间的时间间隔可能完全不阻塞)。

trans-unit.source: The title of an HTML document can be accessed with the title() property. Additionally, a web site may specify an icon, which can be accessed using the icon() or its URL using the iconUrl() property. If the title or the icon changes, the corresponding titleChanged(), iconChanged() and iconUrlChanged() signals will be emitted. The zoomFactor() property enables zooming the contents of the web page by a scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用title（）属性访问HTML文档的标题。此外，网站可以指定一个图标，可以使用icon（）或使用iconUrl（）属性访问其URL 。如果标题或图标发生更改，将发出相应的titleChanged（），iconChanged（）和iconUrlChanged（）信号。该zoomFactor（）属性使缩放系数缩放网页的内容。

trans-unit.source: The trace API consists of the following virtual methods, which the input method must implement in order to receive and process trace input data.

trans-unit.target: 通过调用traceEnd（）方法来结束跟踪交互。

trans-unit.source: The trace interaction is started when an input source detects a new contact point, and calls the traceBegin method for a new trace object. If the input method accepts the interaction, it creates a new trace object and returns it to the caller. From this point on, trace data is collected until the traceEnd method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当输入源检测到一个新的接触点时,开始进行跟踪交互,并调用traceBegin方法以获得一个新的跟踪对象。如果输入方法接受了交互,它就会创建一个新的跟踪对象并将其返回给调用者。从这一点开始,跟踪数据被收集,直到调用traceEnd方法。

trans-unit.source: The tradition of "Manhattan length" arises because such distances apply to travelers who can only travel on a rectangular grid, like the streets of Manhattan.
trans-unit.target: "曼哈顿长度 "的传统之所以产生,是因为这样的距离适用于只能在曼哈顿的街道等矩形网格上行驶的旅行者。

trans-unit.source: The traditional C++ approach for storing OR-combinations of enum values is to use an int or uint variable. The inconvenience with this approach is that there's no type checking at all; any enum value can be OR'd with any other enum value and passed on to a function that takes an int or uint.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储枚举值的OR组合的传统C ++方法是使用 int 或 uint 变量。这种方法的不便之处在于根本没有类型检查。任何枚举值都可以与任何其他枚举值进行“或”运算，然后传递给采用 int 或 uint 的函数。

trans-unit.source: The traditional approach to supporting high DPI has been one where Qt scaled fonts automatically, and then provided a DPI value that application code could use to scale the rest of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 传统的支持高DPI的方法是Qt自动缩放字体,然后提供一个DPI值,应用程序代码可以用来缩放UI的其他部分。

trans-unit.source: The traditional assumption in Qt Quick is that Y points up in the normalized device coordinate system. There is at least one modern graphics API where this is not the case (Vulkan). This flag can then be used to get a projection that is appropriate for such an API.

trans-unit.source: The transfer function or gamma curve determines how each component in the color space is encoded. These are used because human perception does not operate linearly, and the transfer functions try to ensure that colors will seem evenly spaced to human eyes.

trans-unit.source: The transform nodes implement a 4x4 matrix which in theory supports full 3D transformations. However, because the renderer optimizes for 2D use-cases rather than 3D use-cases, rendering a scene with full 3D transformations needs to be done with some care.
trans-unit.target: 变换节点实现了一个4x4矩阵,理论上支持全3D变换。然而,由于渲染器是针对 2D 使用情况而非 3D 使用情况进行优化,因此在渲染全 3D 变换的场景时需要小心谨慎。

trans-unit.source: The transformation
trans-unit.target: 改革

trans-unit.source: The transformation is performed quickly, with no smoothing.
trans-unit.target: 转变的速度很快,没有平滑。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformation that maps the item's coordinate system to its parent.
The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformations for the item.
The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformation that maps the item's coordinate system to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵与项目的旋转（），比例（）和转换（）组合为一个组合的转换，该转换将项目的坐标系映射到其父项。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformations for the item.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵与项目的旋转（），比例（）和转换（）组合为项目的组合转换。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix tranforms the scene into view coordinates. Using the default transformation, provided by the identity matrix, one pixel in the view represents one unit in the scene (e.g., a 10x10 rectangular item is drawn using 10x10 pixels in the view). If a 2x2 scaling matrix is applied, the scene will be drawn in 1:2 (e.g., a 10x10 rectangular item is then drawn using 20x20 pixels in the view).
trans-unit.target: 变换矩阵将场景转化为视图坐标。使用身份矩阵提供的默认变换,视图中的一个像素代表场景中的一个单位(例如,在视图中使用10x10像素绘制一个10x10的矩形项目)。如果应用2x2缩放矩阵,场景将以1:2的比例绘制(例如,一个10x10的矩形项目将以视图中的20x20像素绘制)。

trans-unit.source: The transformation type is the highest enumeration value capturing all of the matrix's transformations. For example, if the matrix both scales and shears, the type would be TxShear, because TxShear has a higher enumeration value than TxScale.
trans-unit.target: 转换类型是捕获所有矩阵转换的最高枚举值。例如，如果矩阵同时缩放和剪切，则类型将为 TxShear ，因为 TxShear 的枚举值比 TxScale 高。

trans-unit.source: The transformations are combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transform() to map the item's coordinate system to the parent item.
The transformations are combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transform() to map the item's coordinate system to the parent item.
trans-unit.target: 转换与项目的旋转（），比例（）和transform（）相结合，以将项目的坐标系映射到父项目。

trans-unit.source: The transformed() function returns a copy of the image that is transformed with the given transformation matrix and transformation mode: Internally, the transformation matrix is adjusted to compensate for unwanted translation, i.e. transformed() returns the smallest image containing all transformed points of the original image. The static trueMatrix() function returns the actual matrix used for transforming the image.

trans-unit.source: The transition can use the ViewTransition property to access more details about the item that is being moved. Note, however, that for this move transition, the ViewTransition.targetIndexes and ViewTransition.targetItems lists are only set when this transition is triggered by the addition of other items in the positioner; in other cases, these lists will be empty. See the ViewTransition documentation for more details and examples on using these transitions.
trans-unit.target: 过渡可以使用ViewTransition属性访问有关正在移动的项目的更多详细信息。但是请注意，对于此移动过渡，仅当通过在定位器中添加其他项目触发此过渡时，才设置ViewTransition .targetIndexes和ViewTransition .targetItems列表。在其他情况下，这些列表将为空。有关使用这些过渡的更多详细信息和示例，请参见ViewTransition文档。

trans-unit.source: The translation system consolidates the user interface text strings into unique items. This consolidation saves the person doing the translation work having to translate the same text multiple times. However, in some cases, the text is identical but has a different meaning. For example, in English, "back" means take a step backward and also means the part of an object opposite to the front. You need to tell the translation system about these two separate meanings so the translator can create two separate translations.
trans-unit.target: 翻译系统将用户界面的文本字符串整合成独特的项目。这种整合使从事翻译工作的人不必多次翻译同一文本。然而,在某些情况下,文本是相同的,但有不同的含义。例如,在英语中,"back "的意思是向后退一步,也指物体与正面相对的部分。你需要把这两个不同的意思告诉翻译系统,这样译员就可以创建两个不同的译文。

The transport object implements a minimal message passing interface. It should be an object with a send() function, which takes a stringified JSON message and transmits it to the server-side QWebChannelAbstractTransport object. Furthermore, its onmessage property should be called when a message from the server was received. Alternatively, you can use a WebSocket to implement the interface.
trans-unit.target: 传输对象实现了最少的消息传递接口。它应该是带有 send() 函数的对象，该函数接受字符串化的JSON消息并将其传输到服务器端QWebChannelAbstractTransport对象。此外， onmessage 接收到来自服务器的消息时，应调用其onmessage属性。另外，您可以使用WebSocket来实现该接口。

trans-unit.source: The transport object must be an implementation of QWebChannelAbstractTransport.
trans-unit.target: 传输对象必须是QWebChannelAbstractTransport的实现。

trans-unit.source: The transport object then handles the communication between the C++ application and a remote HTML client.
trans-unit.target: 然后,传输对象处理C++应用程序和远程HTML客户端之间的通信。

The two most common forms of composition are Source and SourceOver. Source is used to draw opaque objects onto a paint device. In this mode, each pixel in the source replaces the corresponding pixel in the destination. In SourceOver composition mode, the source object is transparent and is drawn on top of the destination.
trans-unit.target: 两种最常见的组合形式是Source和SourceOver。Source用于将不透明的对象绘制到绘制设备上。在此模式下，源中的每个像素替换目标中的相应像素。在SourceOver合成模式下，源对象是透明的，并绘制在目标的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The two most commonly used properties of the MapGestureArea are the enabled and acceptedGestures properties. Both of these must be set before a MapGestureArea will have any effect upon interaction with the Map. The flickDeceleration property controls how quickly the map pan slows after contact is released while panning the map.
trans-unit.target: MapGestureArea的两个最常用的属性是enabled和acceptedGestures属性。必须在MapGestureArea对与Map交互产生任何影响之前进行设置。该flickDeceleration属性控制如何迅速接触后，地图平移减慢，而平移地图被释放。

trans-unit.source: The two-arguments overloads take an unsigned integer that should be used to seed the calculation of the hash function. This seed is provided by QHash in order to prevent a family of algorithmic complexity attacks. If both a one-argument and a two-arguments overload are defined for a key type, the latter is used by QHash (note that you can simply define a two-arguments version, and use a default value for the seed parameter).
trans-unit.target: 包含两个参数的重载采用一个无符号整数，该整数应用于散列哈希函数的计算。QHash提供此种子是为了防止一系列算法复杂性攻击。如果为键类型同时定义了一个参数和两个参数的重载，则QHash将使用后者（请注意，您可以简单地定义一个两个参数的版本，并使用默认值作为seed参数）。

trans-unit.source: The two-arguments overloads take an unsigned integer that should be used to seed the calculation of the hash function. This seed is provided by QHash in order to prevent a family of algorithmic complexity attacks. If both a one-argument and a two-arguments overload are defined for a key type, the latter is used by QHash (note that you can simply define a two-arguments version, and use a default value for the seed parameter).

trans-unit.source: The type of such native handles is highly platform specific and in some cases the platform plugin will need more information to adopt a handle, just the handle in itself will not be sufficient. Therefore the public API consists of functions taking or returning a QVariant that contains a platform-specific value type. See for example QOpenGLContext::setNativeHandle() and QOpenGLContext::nativeHandle(). When running on Linux/X11, using the xcb platform plugin and the GLX windowing system interface, the variant contains a QGLXNativeContext. On other platforms a different class will be used. These classes are all placed in the Qt Platform Headers module.
trans-unit.target: 这种本机句柄的类型是高度特定于平台的，在某些情况下，平台插件将需要更多信息来采用句柄，仅句柄本身是不够的。因此，公共API由采用或返回包含特定于平台的值类型的QVariant的函数组成。例如，请参见QOpenGLContext :: setNativeHandle（）和QOpenGLContext :: nativeHandle（）。在Linux / X11上运行时，使用xcb平台插件和GLX窗口系统接口，该变体包含QGLXNativeContext。在其他平台上，将使用不同的类。这些类都放在Qt Platform Headers模块中。

trans-unit.source: The type of such native handles is highly platform specific and in some cases the platform plugin will need more information to adopt a handle, just the handle in itself will not be sufficient. Therefore the public API consists of functions taking or returning a QVariant that contains a platform-specific value type. See for example QOpenGLContext::setNativeHandle() and QOpenGLContext::nativeHandle(). When running on Linux/X11, using the xcb platform plugin and the GLX windowing system interface, the variant contains a QGLXNativeContext. On other platforms a different class will be used. These classes are all placed in the Qt Platform Headers module.

trans-unit.source: The typical approach is to use the QPlaceManager::compatiblePlace() function, it creates a copy of a place, but only copies data that the manager supports. Manager specific data such as the place identifier is not copied over. The new copy is now suitable for saving into the manager. If the manager supports matching by alternative identifiers, an alternative identifier attribute is assigned to the copy (see Matching places between managers)
trans-unit.target: 典型的方法是使用QPlaceManager :: compatiblePlace（）函数，它创建场所的副本，但仅复制管理器支持的数据。经理特定的数据（例如，地点标识符）不会被复制。现在，新副本适合保存到管理器中。如果管理器支持按备用标识符进行匹配，则将备用标识符属性分配给副本（请参阅管理器之间的匹配位置）

trans-unit.source: The typical approach is to use the QPlaceManager::compatiblePlace() function, it creates a copy of a place, but only copies data that the manager supports. Manager specific data such as the place identifier is not copied over. The new copy is now suitable for saving into the manager. If the manager supports matching by alternative identifiers, an alternative identifier attribute is assigned to the copy (see Matching places between managers)

The typical key for matching is the QPlaceMatchRequest::AlternativeId, the value is an alternative identifier attribute type of the format x_id_<provider name> for example x_id_here. The provider name is name supplied to the QGeoServiceProvider instance.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的典型键是QPlaceMatchRequest :: AlternativeId，该值是格式为x_id_ <提供者名称>的替代标识符属性类型，例如x_id_here。提供程序名称是提供给QGeoServiceProvider实例的名称。

trans-unit.source: The typical use of QCborStreamWriter is to create the object on the target QByteArray or QIODevice, then call one of the append() overloads with the desired type to be encoded. To create arrays and maps, QCborStreamWriter provides startArray() and startMap() overloads, which must be terminated by the corresponding endArray() and endMap() functions.
trans-unit.target: QCborStreamWriter的典型用法是在目标QByteArray或QIODevice上创建对象，然后使用要编码的所需类型调用append（）重载之一。为了创建数组和映射，QCborStreamWriter提供了startArray（）和startMap（）重载，它们必须由相应的endArray（）和endMap（）函数终止。

trans-unit.source: The typical use of QCborStreamWriter is to create the object on the target QByteArray or QIODevice, then call one of the append() overloads with the desired type to be encoded. To create arrays and maps, QCborStreamWriter provides startArray() and startMap() overloads, which must be terminated by the corresponding endArray() and endMap() functions.

The typical use-case for the class is to create a QDeadlineTimer before the operation in question is started, and then use remainingTime() or hasExpired() to determine whether to continue trying the operation. QDeadlineTimer objects can be passed to functions being called to execute this operation so they know how long to still operate.
trans-unit.target: 该类的典型用例是在开始有关操作之前创建QDeadlineTimer，然后使用剩余时间（）或hasExpired（）确定是否继续尝试该操作。可以将QDeadlineTimer对象传递给被调用以执行此操作的函数，以便它们知道仍可以运行多长时间。

trans-unit.source: The typical use-case for the class is to create a QDeadlineTimer before the operation in question is started, and then use remainingTime() or hasExpired() to determine whether to continue trying the operation. QDeadlineTimer objects can be passed to functions being called to execute this operation so they know how long to still operate.

trans-unit.source: The typical way to handle context loss scenarios in applications is to check via this function whenever makeCurrent() fails and returns false. If this function then returns false, recreate the underlying native OpenGL context by calling create(), call makeCurrent() again and then reinitialize all OpenGL resources.
trans-unit.target: 处理应用程序中上下文丢失情况的典型方法是，每当makeCurrent（）失败并返回 false 时，通过此函数进行检查。如果此函数然后返回 false ，则通过调用create（）重新创建基础的本机OpenGL上下文，再次调用makeCurrent（），然后重新初始化所有OpenGL资源。

trans-unit.source: The uiLanguage holds the name of the language to be used for user interface string translations. It is exposed in C++ as QQmlEngine::uiLanguage property.
The underline is drawn depending on the SpellCheckUnderlineStyle theme hint of QPlatformTheme. By default this is mapped to WaveUnderline, on macOS it is mapped to DotLine.

trans-unit.source: The underline is drawn depending on the SpellCheckUnderlineStyle theme hint of QPlatformTheme. By default this is mapped to WaveUnderline, on macOS it is mapped to DotLine.

The underlying data model is exposed to views and delegates as a hierarchy of tables. If you do not make use of the hierarchy, then the model is a simple table of rows and columns. Each item has a unique index specified by a QModelIndex.
trans-unit.target: 基础数据模型作为表的层次结构公开给视图和委托。如果不使用层次结构，则模型是一个简单的行和列表。每个项目都有一个由QModelIndex指定的唯一索引。

trans-unit.source: The unit of width is the unit of the x-axis. The minimum width for bars is zero, and negative values are treated as zero. Setting the width to zero means that the width of the bar on the screen is one pixel regardless of the scale of the x-axis. Bars wider than zero are scaled using the x-axis scale.
trans-unit.target: 宽度的单位是x轴的单位。条形图的最小宽度为零,负值视为零。将宽度设置为零意味着无论x轴的比例是多少,屏幕上的条形图的宽度都是一个像素。宽于零的条形图将使用X轴的刻度来调整。

trans-unit.source: The units are determined by the underlying paint device. The size is measured in logical pixels when painting to the screen, and in points (1/72 inch) when painting to a printer.
trans-unit.target: 单位由底层的绘画设备决定。在屏幕上绘画时,尺寸以逻辑像素为单位,在打印机上绘画时,尺寸以点(1/72英寸)为单位。

trans-unit.source: The units used are those currently defined for the layout. To use different units call setUnits() first.

trans-unit.source: The up button and arrow can be styled using the ::up-button and ::up-arrow subcontrols. By default, the up-button is placed in the top right corner in the Padding rectangle of the widget. Without an explicit size, it occupies half the height of its reference rectangle. The up-arrow is placed in the center of the Contents rectangle of the up-button.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用:: up-button和:: up-arrow子控件设置向上按钮和箭头的样式。默认情况下，向上按钮位于小部件的“填充”矩形的右上角。如果没有显式的大小，则它将占据其参考矩形的高度的一半。向上箭头放置在向上按钮的内容矩形的中央。

The usual pattern is to use a gadget class as the type of a property, or to emit a gadget as a signal argument. In such cases, the gadget instance is passed by value between C++ and QML (because it's a value type). If QML code changes a property of a gadget property, the entire gadget is re-created and passed back to the C++ property setter. In Qt 5, gadget types cannot be instantiated by direct declaration in QML. In contrast, a QObject instance can be declared; and QObject instances are always passed by pointer from C++ to QML.

The utilities need to be in a standard location, such as /bin or /usr/bin. Alternatively, you can use the ~/.ssh/environment file to set variables for remote commands, such as PATH. In addition, you must set enable PermitUserEnvironment in the SSH Daemon configuration.
trans-unit.target: 实用程序必须位于标准位置，例如 /bin 或 /usr/bin 。另外，您可以使用 ~/.ssh/environment 文件来设置远程命令的变量，例如 PATH 。另外，必须在SSH守护程序配置中设置 enable PermitUserEnvironment 。

trans-unit.source: The valid values range depends on the parameter type. For WhiteBalancePreset the value should be one of QCameraImageProcessing::WhiteBalanceMode values; for Contrast, Saturation, Brightness, Sharpening and Denoising the value should be in [0..1.0] range with invalid QVariant value indicating the default parameter value; for ContrastAdjustment, SaturationAdjustment, BrightnessAdjustment, SharpeningAdjustment and DenoisingAdjustment the value should be in [-1.0..1.0] range with default 0.
trans-unit.target: 有效值范围取决于参数类型。对于WhiteBalancePreset，该值应为QCameraImageProcessing :: WhiteBalanceMode值之一；对于“对比度”，“饱和度”，“亮度”，“锐化”和“降噪”，该值应在[0..1.0]范围内，其中无效的QVariant值指示默认参数值；对于ContrastAdjustment，SaturationAdjustment，BrightnessAdjustment，SharpeningAdjustment和DenoisingAdjustment的值应该是在[-1.0..1.0]范围内具有默认0。

The value 0.0 indicates that the labels should be drawn next to the 0-angle angular axis grid line. The value 1.0 indicates that the labels are drawn in their usual place at the edge of the graph background. Defaults to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 值 0.0 表示应在0角角度轴网格线旁边绘制标签。值 1.0 表示标签是在图形背景边缘的通常位置绘制的。默认为 1.0 。

trans-unit.source: The value 1.0 means that the bars are as wide as they are deep, whereas 0.5 makes them twice as deep as they are wide. Preset to 1.0 by default.
trans-unit.target: 值 1.0 意味着该棒是一样宽，因为它们是深的，而 0.5 使得它们的两倍深，因为它们宽。默认预设为 1.0 。

trans-unit.source: The value true indicates that it's now possible for clients to start using the seat.
trans-unit.target: 值 true 表示客户现在可以开始使用座位。

trans-unit.source: The value bar is 28 pixels wide, so we give the same width to our tickmarks so that they cover the width of it.
trans-unit.target: 值栏的宽度为 28 像素，因此我们给刻度线提供了相同的宽度，以便它们覆盖其宽度。

trans-unit.source: The value being displayed will vary from 0 to 150 periodically.

trans-unit.source: The value can be any combination of the values in the AutoFormattingFlag enum. The default is AutoNone. Choose AutoAll to enable all automatic formatting.

trans-unit.source: The value can be changed while the media is playing, in which case it will update the remaining loops to the new value.

trans-unit.target: 该值可以在播放声音效果时改变,在这种情况下,它将把剩余的循环更新为新的值。

trans-unit.source: The value can be one of:

trans-unit.source: The value for this delegate from the model.

trans-unit.source: The value grows cosinusoidally.
trans-unit.target: 该值呈余弦增长。

trans-unit.source: The value grows linearly (e.g., if the duration is 1000 ms, the value at time 500 ms is 0.5).
trans-unit.target: 该值呈线性增长(例如,如果持续时间为1000毫秒,则500毫秒时的值为0.5)。

trans-unit.source: The value grows sinusoidally.
trans-unit.target: 值呈正弦增长。

trans-unit.source: The value has to be greater than 0 and cannot equal 1.
trans-unit.target: 该值必须大于0,不能等于1。

trans-unit.source: The value is 1 by default: the animation will be played once and then stop.
trans-unit.target: 该值默认为1:动画将播放一次,然后停止。

trans-unit.source: The value is 1.0 by default.

trans-unit.source: The value is a BLOB of data, stored exactly as it was input.

trans-unit.source: The value is a URL and must either be a local file or use the qrc scheme to access files embedded via the Qt resource system. Relative file paths (without a scheme) are also accepted, in which case the file is treated as relative to the component (the .qml file).
